name: Bool To Audio
description: Convert a boolean value to an audio signal, with optional rise and fall times.

inputs.name: Value
inputs.description: Boolean input to convert to audio.

inputs.name: Rise Time
inputs.description: Rise time in seconds.

inputs.name: Fall Time
inputs.description: Fall time in seconds.

name: Clock Divider
description: Divide a trigger into eight density levels.

inputs.name: Trigger
inputs.description: Input trigger to the clock divider.

inputs.name: Reset
inputs.description: Reset the clock divider.

name: Dust (Audio)
description: Generate randomly timed impulses (unipolar or alternating polarity per impulse) with density control and audio-rate modulation.

inputs.name: Enabled
inputs.description: Enable or disable the dust node.

inputs.name: Bi-Polar
inputs.description: Toggle between bipolar and unipolar impulse output.

inputs.name: Density
inputs.description: Probability of impulse generation.

inputs.name: Modulation
inputs.description: Density control signal.

name: Dust (Trigger)
description: Generate randomly timed impulses (unipolar or alternating polarity per impulse) with density control and audio-rate modulation.

inputs.name: Enabled
inputs.description: Enable or disable the dust node.

inputs.name: Bi-Polar
inputs.description: Toggle between bipolar and unipolar impulse output.

inputs.name: Density
inputs.description: Probability of impulse generation.

inputs.name: Modulation
inputs.description: Density control signal.

name: Edge
description: Detect upward and downward changes in an input audio signal, with optional debounce.

inputs.name: In
inputs.description: Input audio to monitor for edge detection.

inputs.name: Debounce
inputs.description: Debounce time in seconds to prevent rapid triggering.

name: EDO
description: Generate frequencies for tuning systems using equally divided octaves (float) with a MIDI note input. Set a reference frequency and reference MIDI note (defaults to A440).

inputs.name: Note Number
inputs.description: Input MIDI note number.

inputs.name: Reference Frequency
inputs.description: Reference frequency.

inputs.name: Reference MIDI Note
inputs.description: Reference MIDI note (integer).

inputs.name: Divisions
inputs.description: Number of divisions of the octave (integer).

name: Impulse
description: Trigger a one-sample impulse (unipolar or alternating polarity per impulse).

inputs.name: Trigger
inputs.description: Trigger input to generate an impulse.

inputs.name: Bi-Polar
inputs.description: Toggle between bipolar and unipolar impulse output.

name: Phase Disperser
description: A chain of allpass filters to soften transients and add that classic laser/slinky-style effect.

inputs.name: In
inputs.description: Incoming audio.

inputs.name: Stages
inputs.description: Number of allpass filter stages to apply (1-128).

name: Shift Register
description: An eight-stage shift register for floats.

inputs.name: Signal
inputs.description: Input signal to be shifted.

inputs.name: Trigger
inputs.description: Trigger input to shift the register.

name: Slew (Audio)
description: A slew rate limiter to smooth out the rise and fall times of an audio signal.

inputs.name: In
inputs.description: Audio signal to smooth.

inputs.name: Rise Time
inputs.description: Rise time in seconds.

inputs.name: Fall Time
inputs.description: Fall time in seconds.

name: Slew (Float)
description: A slew limiter to smooth out the rise and fall times of a float value.

inputs.name: In
inputs.description: Float to smooth.

inputs.name: Rise Time
inputs.description: Rise time in seconds.

inputs.name: Fall Time
inputs.description: Fall time in seconds.

name: Stereo Balance
description: Adjust the balance of a stereo signal.

inputs.name: In L
inputs.description: Left channel.

inputs.name: In R
inputs.description: Right channel.

inputs.name: Balance
inputs.description: Balance control ranging from -1.0 (full left) to 1.0 (full right).

outputs.name: Out L
outputs.description: Left channel of the adjusted stereo output signal.

outputs.name: Out R
outputs.description: Right channel of the adjusted stereo output signal.

inputs.name: In1 L
inputs.description: Left channel of first input.

inputs.name: In1 R
inputs.description: Right channel of first input.

inputs.name: In2 L
inputs.description: Left channel of second input.

inputs.name: In2 R
inputs.description: Right channel of second input.

inputs.name: Crossfade
inputs.description: Crossfade between the two inputs (0.0 to 1.0).

outputs.name: Out L
outputs.description: Left channel of the output signal.

outputs.name: Out R
outputs.description: Right channel of the output signal.

name: Stereo Gain
description: Adjust gain for a stereo signal.

inputs.name: In L
inputs.description: Left channel.

inputs.name: In R
inputs.description: Right channel.

inputs.name: Balance
inputs.description: Gain control (0.0 to 1.0).

outputs.name: Out L
outputs.description: Left channel of the adjusted stereo output signal.

outputs.name: Out R
outputs.description: Right channel of the adjusted stereo output signal.

inputs.name: In L
inputs.description: Left channel audio input.

inputs.name: In R
inputs.description: Right channel audio input.

inputs.name: Invert L
inputs.description: Invert the polarity of the left channel.

inputs.name: Invert R
inputs.description: Invert the polarity of the right channel.

inputs.name: Swap L/R
inputs.description: Swap the left and right channels.

name: Stereo Width
description: Stereo width adjustment (0-200%), using mid-side processing.

inputs.name: In L
inputs.description: Left channel.

inputs.name: In R
inputs.description: Right channel.

inputs.name: Width
inputs.description: Stereo width factor ranging from 0 to 200% (0 - 2).

outputs.name: Out L
outputs.description: Left channel of the adjusted stereo output signal.

outputs.name: Out R
outputs.description: Right channel of the adjusted stereo output signal.

inputs.name: Note Number
inputs.description: Input MIDI note number (integer).

inputs.name: +/- Cents C
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 0 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents C# / Db
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 1 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents D
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 2 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents D# / Eb
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 3 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents E
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 4 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents F
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 5 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents F# / Gb
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 6 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents G
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 7 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents G# / Ab
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 8 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents A
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 9 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents A# / Bb
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 10 in cents.

inputs.name: +/- Cents B
inputs.description: Tuning adjustment for note 11 in cents.

name: Zero Crossing
description: Detect zero crossings in an input audio signal, with optional debounce.

inputs.name: Signal
inputs.description: Input audio signal to monitor for zero crossings.

inputs.name: Debounce
inputs.description: Debounce time in seconds to prevent rapid triggering.

outputs.name: Trigger
outputs.description: Output trigger when zero crossing is detected.
